resources.string: While your phone is updating, you cannot make emergency calls. Your phone will restart during update.
A system update is ready for download and installation.
Your phone will be reset to factory settings. All data will be erased. Please back up your data before installation.
Download in progress. This may take some time.
Your phone will be reset to factory settings. All data will be erased.
Go online and check for updates according to schedule from server
Using this service over your mobile network connection may result in additional fees from your wireless provider if you do not have an unlimited data plan. Enable scheduled check?

We suggest that you keep this option enabled in order to keep your phone software up to date. The check messages consume a very small amount of data, are anonymous and do not include any personal information. Turn off scheduled check?
Your phone is up to date
There are no updates available for your phone.
Your phone is downloading the software updates.
Would you like to download the following system software update?
Download via any available data connection
Download via mobile network or Wi-Fi or 4G
Download via Wi-Fi or cable only
Using this service over your mobile network connection may result in additional fees from your wireless provider if you do not have an unlimited data plan. Download updates now?
Downloading will start when Wi-Fi or Internet pass-through are connected, and will pause if they disconnect.
Your phone will check for updates at the next scheduled time. You can check for updates manually in Settings.
Your phone will check for updates at the next scheduled time.
"The downloaded system software update is corrupted. Do you want to download it again?"
You need an SD card to download the system update. Please insert an SD card and press OK to start the download, or press Cancel to exit.
"You don't have enough space remaining on your storage card. Please delete some content or applications to make at least %s MB of free space. Tap \"Settings\" below to make more free space."
"You don't have enough space remaining on your storage card. Please delete some content or applications to make at least %s MB of free space."
An error occurred while saving the system update to your SD card. The download process cannot be completed. Please replace your SD card and check for updates again in Settings, under About phone.
An error occurred while saving the system update to your SD card. The download process cannot be completed.
Would you like to install the following system software update?
You can start installation from the notifications bar at any time.
This will stop the update process and delete the downloaded update file from your phone. Cancel now?
Tap to install the system update
This feature has been disabled by your provider
"The system update is ready, but your phone's battery is too low to install it. Please charge the battery to 35% or more and start installation later."
You need an SD card to back up your data. Please insert an SD card and press OK to continue, or press Cancel to skip the backup.
There is not enough free space on your SD card to back up your data. Please replace your SD card and press OK to continue, or press Cancel to skip the backup.
You will not be able to use your phone or make emergency calls during the upgrade. Please do not turn off your phone, or remove the battery or storage card during the upgrade.

If you have enabled data backup in Settings, some of your data and settings, such as messages, bookmarks and Wi-Fi passwords, will be preserved, but we suggest that you back up your data before installation.
Your phone has been updated successfully to version %s.
Download is paused because Wi-Fi or Internet pass-through connection was lost.
Tap to download the system update
Downloading software updates. Check progress in the notifications list.

"The system update is ready, but you don't have enough free space remaining in your phone's storage. Please uninstall some applications to make at least %sMB of free space.
Tap \"Settings\" below to manage your apps. You can start installation later from the notifications list."
Please insert the SD card on which you stored the downloaded system software update.
Unable to read the SD card on which you stored the downloaded system software update because it is being used by your PC as USB storage. Disconnect USB to access your SD card.
Your SD card is not available to store the system software update because it is being used by your PC as USB storage. Disconnect USB and press OK to start the download, or press Cancel to exit.
The downloaded system software update is missing from your SD card. Do you want to download it again?
Tap to download the application updates
Would you like to install the following application updates?

"Unable to continue to update your software because there is not enough free temporary space in your phone's storage.
You may try restart your phone and check for software updates again in Settings, under About phone."

"An error occurred while downloading the software updates.
You may check for software updates again in Settings, under About phone."

"There is a problem with the downloaded software update file. Unable to continue installation.
You may check for software updates again in Settings, under About phone."

"Unable to continue to update your software because there is not enough free space in your phone's storage. Please uninstall some apps to make more space.
Tap \"Settings\" below to manage your apps. You may check for software updates again in Settings, under About phone."

"An error occurred while installing the software updates.
You may check for software updates again in Settings, under About phone."
The updates have been successfully installed on your phone.

We have determined that your phone may be running a modified version of its system software. For your protection, we cannot update your phone. Please revert your phone to the official HTC system software to update your phone. If you did not modify your system software or would like help reverting your system, please contact us via the support section at www.htc.com.
Your SD card is not available to store the software update because it is mounted as read-only mode. You may reboot your phone and check for updates again in Settings, under About phone.
The action works only in Wi-Fi or cable connection. Please turn on the Wi-Fi in Settings, or use the cable connection to a computer.
Failed to connect to the key server. Check connection and try again.
Your phone is not authorized to get the decryption key.
The update is located on the testing server and not accessible from outside the company Intranet. Please try download again when you are back to Intranet.
Download is paused because your data connection was lost.
Download is paused because your data connection is in roaming mode. Please use Wi-Fi or cable.
Your phone storage is not available to store the system software update because it is being used by your PC as USB storage. Disconnect USB and press OK to start the download, or press Cancel to exit.
"You don't have enough space remaining on your phone storage. Please delete some content or applications to make at least %s MB of free space. Tap \"Settings\" below to make more free space."
An error occurred while saving the system update to your phone storage. The download process cannot be completed.
Unable to read the phone storage on which you stored the downloaded system software update because it is being used by your PC as USB storage. Disconnect USB to access your phone storage.
The downloaded system software update is missing from your phone storage. Do you want to download it again?
Your phone storage is not available to store the software update because it is mounted as read-only mode. You may reboot your device and check for updates again in Settings, under About phone.
Download will start when Wi-Fi is connected, and will pause if Wi-Fi disconnects.
Download is paused because Wi-Fi connection was lost.
Download is paused because your data connection is in roaming mode. Please use Wi-Fi.
You can find canceled updates later in Settings > About phone > Software updates.
Would you like to download the update?
"You don't have enough free space remaining in your phone's storage. Please delete some content or applications to make at least %s free space. Tap \"Settings\" below to manage your apps."
"There is a problem with the downloaded software update file. Unable to continue installation. Do you want to download it again?"
Would you like to install the update now?
Your phone downloaded application updates and needs to be restarted to complete the update process. Please press Restart now.
